Series.Actors: |Dean Norris|Mike Vogel|Rachelle Lefevre|Max Ehrich|Grace Victoria Cox|John Elvis|Jolene Purdy|Nicholas Strong|Aisha Hinds|Mackenzie Lintz|Alexander Koch|Natalie Martinez|Britt Robertson|Colin Ford|
Series.Overview: An invisible and mysterious force field descends upon a small fictional town in the United States, trapping residents inside, cut off from the rest of civilization. The trapped townsfolk must discover the secrets and purpose of the "dome" and its origins, while coming to learn more than they ever knew about each other.
